column4: interesting.... i thought ubuntu was at 10.10...  i upgraded from 10.04 and it put me at 11.04 -- natty narwhal.  err... is this right?
That's a known bug in the help file.  You're on Maverick really.
your right thank you very much, didn't seem right ya know?  says 10.10 under lsb_release.  with a multitouch tx2z i don't wanna play with unstable nemore, i hear there is good support in maverick
